data.message: Idk who the other two goofballs are but Eminem on SNL should be dope, might actually watch. At least DVR.

replies.message: Are u racist? U sound like it. How can u call 2 black people goofballs. Everyone know who leslie jone and chance is. Stfu
Uhhh Eminem’s past two new songs are pretty awful. Unfortunately 😩
I didn't call them goofballs cause they were black. I called them goofballs because they look like goofballs. You brought race into it, not me. Stop reaching.
Chance The Rapper and SNL actress Leslie Jones
Hmm, Chance the Rapper... Interesting. What does he do? He seems cool.
how do you not know at least chance😂

China Reid ... Not everybody

I don't know which of them is chance the rapper

One of the other two supposed goof balls, is taking bigger steps in stopping gangviolence and blackonblack crime that any other rapper or politician. A bit of research goes a long way in not seeming like a goofball yourself.

Oh word? That's dope af dude. Is that why he wears a three on his hat? And she must be a comic right? That's why she has that "wacky" hair cut? She must be hilarious. 

Thanks for the heads up bro!

China Reid How the hell is calling someone a goofball racist. Exactly how do you draw that conclusion. Explain it to me, because in my mind it did sound judgemental, but not bigoted. And especially not bigoted with racial motivations. People like you use the term and don't realize you effectively weaken the meaning and impact of the term in the long run for the current and coming generations. Dont throw racist around like it has no meaning, otherwise you end up with not just white people, but people in general discrediting the term. Do you understand that is part of the problem? Or do you want to keep flinging around words and dilluting their impact and meaning? Your choice may impact coming generations, so choose wisely.

he wears a 3 to promote his third mixtape
which has been out for the past year and a half so idk why he still wears the 3 hat lol
Well he'll have to change it to a 4 when that new shit drops
I had no idea who they were either. Never seen SNL, but I may watch for Eminem. How is saying someone that is acting goofy(which I’m pretty sure what SNL is about) is a goofball judgmental?
